name: Axel (GDPanda)
description:
Play as Axel the axolotl in this short 2D adventure game.

Axel is hungry! Hungry for adventure (and ramen).
Using his bubble-blowing abilities you have to help him swim through a small underwater adventure, avoid dangerous pufferfish and navigate through streams of fish!

 - Controls - 

WASD/Arrow Keys to move
Hold Spacebar to blow bubbles
(While blowing bubbles, aim with WASD/Arrow Keys)

  - Credits - 

Programming and art - Jonas Odden (GDPanda)
Art help - Rinni Knudsen (Irina)
Sound effects - Soundly
Music - Water Memory (Richard Anthony D Pike, Universal Productions Music)
Font - Pixel (Dale Harris, 1001fonts)
